attributes.action: declare a Motion of Confidence, to allow the House of Commons to vote on the actions of this current Government, and if the motion fails to pass, dissolve Parliament and call a General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If Gordon Brown calls a Motion of Confidence in his own government that fails to pass after a vote by all MP's, his government is either obliged to resign or dissolve Parliament and call a General Election.

If Gordon Brown truly stands by the actions of his government, he will call this motion and permit the MP's elected by us to decide if they have confidence in him and his government to continue to lead this country.

rejection.details: Your petition calls for similar action as this one http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GoToCountryNow/ please consider adding your signature to this petition instead.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
